alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 1:31PM PST until February 25 at 3:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Winds could gust as high as 90 mph. * WHERE...San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected through Wednesday. The greater potential for heavier snowfall is on Thursday and Friday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
